entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Investigate update FAR-like features to show hits in shared-projects, not the projects the shared filed are linked into #57952
  • CSharpScript with Single File .NET6 not working #57947
  • Need to unify our file system abstractions #57941
    17.1
  • Strong name keys not read at compilation creation time #57940
  • C# Interactive: "#reset core" not available in `csi.exe` #57939
  • EditorConfig setting for csharp_new_line_before_open_brace is not saved correctly in Visual Studio #57937

Closed

  • CSharpRemoveUnusedValuesCodeFixProvider error #51737
    17.1
  • .Net 6 string interpolation for Int32 using a format specifier #57948
  • VisualStudio 2019 'UseSimpleUsingStatementCodeFixProvider' encountered an error and has been disabled. #57771
    17.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add VS integration test pipeline #57953
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Simplify interpolation parsing - 3 #57951
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Simplify interpolation parsing - 2 #57946
    Area-Compilers
  • Simplify the code around parsing interpolated string literals. #57945
    Area-Compilers
  • Use !! in AddParameterCheck refactoring #57934
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Unify representation of an implicit `Index` indexer over an array and non-array types. #57918
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Correctly specify our target folder #57950
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Unify the namespace for our FatalError type #57887
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #57949
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add test for unique FixIdDefinition exports #57933
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix remove-unused-variable for top-level-statements #57930
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57807
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57943
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57944
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57927
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57926
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57938
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57929
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Use InvariantCulture for generated log file name in FileLogger ctor #57816
    Area-IDE, Next
  • use RTM version of nuget packages #57936
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57957
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57956
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57955
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57954
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • List-patterns: add a few tests and add HasValidate flag #57914
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • List patterns: Skip compiler-generated dag nodes for better codegen #57909
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Handling defaults provided by IAsyncCompletionDefaultsSource #57685
    Area-IDE
  • Add IXamlEditAndContinueSolutionProvider for XAML Language Service #57932
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure we cache the previous item when two items are considered equal #57888
    Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Transform the GeneratorDriver even if the Compilation was GCed #57721
    Area-IDE
  • When we're loading dependencies, don't require exact versions #56432
    Area-Analyzers
  • Fix generator caching in compiler server #57177
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • Method group conversion caching redo #57882
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Require definite assignment of all fields if struct includes any field initializers #57925
    Area-Compilers
